titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to include affordable housing incentives in certain capital investment grants, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to include affordable housing incentives in certain capital investment grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
